{T}: Add {B}. Put a ritual counter on Blasphemous Pact.
{2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Beckon X, where X is the number of ritual counters on Blasphemous Pact. [i](You get X ritual counters. Then if you have six or more, remove six and create a 6/6 black Demon creature token.)[/i]
